subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Without a stunning 3-pointer Tuesday night, the Suns would be one loss from playoff elimination. If Phoenix has enough energy left to close out its series with the Clippers in Los Angeles, it would be nearly as surprising.
snippet: Without a stunning 3-pointer Tuesday night, the Suns would be one loss from playoff elimination. If Phoenix has enough energy left to close out its series with the Clippers in Los Angeles, it would be nearly as surprising.
